features.title: Customizable Password Length
features.description: Adjust the password length from 6 to 20 characters using the slider for optimal security.

features.title: Include Numbers
features.description: Option to include numeric digits (0-9) in the generated password for added complexity.

features.title: Include Special Characters
features.description: Add special characters like !@#$%^&*()_+ to make the password stronger against brute-force attacks.

features.title: One-Click Copy
features.description: Easily copy the generated password to your clipboard with a single button click.

instructions.text: Use the slider to set your desired password length between 6 and 20 characters.
Check the 'Numbers' box if you want to include digits in your password.
Check the 'Special Character' box to include symbols for extra security.
The password will generate automatically. Click 'Copy' to save it to your clipboard.
